thread.section_title: Hotel Pas de Calais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel close to sights
thread.title_full: Great hotel close to sights - Review of Hotel Pas de Calais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: tsgluck
title: Great hotel close to sights
text: This is a very nice, small, quaint French hotel. All staff are helpful and genuinely friendly. Rooms are clean and spacious. Bathrooms are modern and roomy. Breakfast is included and quite impressive. Fresh squeezed orange juice, coffee, yogurt, basket of rolls and pastries and assorted cheeses. Very fresh and good. Only a short walk to the Louvre. Very safe area. I would highly recommend this hotel for your visit to Paris.
